Name: Greek Celery Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grind of pepper & celery stick.
Review: Celery and mastiha pair well, while gin adds a spirituous bite and botanical complexity. A small grind of pepper to finish adds a nuance of spice.
History: A simplified version of a drink promoted by Skinos mastiha by yours truly in August 2015 at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Greek Celery Cocktail contains 172 calories
